page.title: 11SHOPPING BASKET 1985
page.content: A survey of prices in local shops in July 1985 show the following:- { {BREAD(sliced) - White - 33p {BREAD(sliced) - Wholemeal - 43p {SUGAR - 1Kg - 45p {EGGS - 1 dozen(12) - 84p {TEA - 125g - 45p {TEABAGS - (Packets of 80) - 98p {FLOUR - 1.5Kg - 36p {BUTTER - 250g - 50p {CHEESE -1lb - 99p {MARGARINE - 250g - 16p {MARMALADE - 1lb - 43p Other prices currently charged:- {PETROL - 1 gallon - Â£1.98 {T.V. Licence - Â£58.00 PA {Local telephone call - 10p {Local Newspaper - 15p {National Newspaper - 20p { {
